entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets. High minus 6. POP 30%
